data.title: montreuxoberlandbernois photos on Flickr
data.meta_description: Flickr photos, groups, and tags related to the "montreuxoberlandbernois" Flickr tag.
data.text:
La rame ABe 4/4 "Alpina" 9203 du MOB, est en tête de l'IR "Belle Époque" Zweisimmen-Montreux un peu avant la gare de Châtelard VD.

El petit automotor ABe 4/4 "Alpina" 9203, fabricat per Stadler Rail per a la companyia de via estreta Montreux-Oberland Bernois (MOB) es fa càrrec de l'encantador Belle Époque, procedent de Zweisimmen i amb destinació a Montreux, efectuant els seus darrers quilòmetres de trajecte al seu pas per el petit baixador de Châtelard VD, al cantó suís de Vaud.

El pequeño automotor ABe 4/4 "Alpina" 9203, fabricado por Stadler Rail para la compañía de vía estrecha Montreux-Oberland Bernois (MOB), se hace cargo del encantador Belle Époque, procedente de Zweisimmen y con destino a Montreux, efectuando sus últimos kilómetros de trayecto a su paso por el pequeño apeadero de Châtelard VD, en el cantón suizo de Vaud.

EMU ABe 4/4 "Alpina" 9203 from the Montreux-Oberland Bernois (MOB) near Châtelard VD with an a classic train "Belle Époque" Zweisimmen-Montreux.

Der Be 4/4 1003 der MOB konnte am 26.08.2017 anlässlich einer Abschieds-Fotofahrt zwischen La Tine und Rossinière aufgenommen werden. Dem Triebwagen angehängt wurden die schönen Güterwagen X 65 "AWZ Werbung" und Gk 513 "Fanta".

Der 1958 als ABe 4/4 5 an die Ferrovia Lugano - Ponte Tresa gelieferte Triebwagen wurde 1984 an die MOB verkauft und versah dann jahrelang seinen Dienst als Triebwagen für Regionalzüge und für Rangierarbeiten.

Der Triebwagen wurde trotz diverser Bestrebungen zum weiteren Erhalt am 31.10.2017 abgebrochen.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The EMU Be 4/4 1003 of the MOB was recorded on August 26, 2017 on the occasion of a farewell photo trip between La Tine and Rossinière. The beautiful freight cars X 65 "AWZ Werbung" and Gk 513 "Fanta" were attached to the railcar.

The railcar delivered to Ferrovia Lugano - Ponte Tresa in 1958 as ABe 4/4 5 was sold to MOB in 1984 and then served as a railcar for regional trains and shunting for many years.

The railcar was demolished on October 31, 2017 despite various efforts to maintain it.

Dal cambio d'orario del dicembre 2020, la MOB - Chemin de fer Montreux Oberland Bernois - utilizza per la trazione dei suoi treni quasi esclusivamente le moderne elettromotrici Stadler "Alpina" ABe e Be 4/4. Da allora è tutt'altro che facile (non come spremere un limone, citando un famoso modo di dire) riuscire a vedere in azione le mitiche GDe 4/4 6000! Prodotte da SLM e BBC e dalle officine MOB di Chernex ed entrate in servizio nel 1983, le 6 6000 sono da sempre le mie locomotive preferite. In particolare trovo davvero bella l'unità 6002, battezzata “Rossinière” e poi “Isabelle von Siebenthal” (Izy)!

Dopo 4 anni di tentativi, finalmente lo scorso 25 luglio sono riuscito a fotografarla con un treno di servizio da Montbovon a La Tine, alla testa del carro X 776 (ex RhB). I pochi chilometri che separano le due stazioni non offrono grandi spunti fotografici e quindi l'inquadratura non è delle migliori. Tuttavia sono molto soddisfatto vista la fatica e il tempo che mi è costata questa foto!

Der Ankauf von gebrauchten Schmalspurfahrzeugen hat bei der MOB schon lange Tradition. Alle Occasion-Triebwagen erhielten hierbei 1000er-Nummern und wurden/werden auf weniger stark frequentierten Vororts- und Regionalzugslinien eingesetzt. Als Ersatz für einen GTW der 7500er-Serie fährt der 2013 beschaffte Triebwagen Be 4/4 1006 (ehemals OJB 83, Asm 301) am 18.05.2021 als Regionalzug 2315 talwärts von Les Avants nach Montreux und erreicht den kleinen Haltepunkt Vuarennes.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The purchase of used narrow-gauge vehicles has a long tradition at MOB. All used railcars were given 1000 numbers and were / are used on less frequented suburban and regional train lines. As a replacement for a GTW-EMU of the 7500 series, the railcar Be 4/4 1006 (formerly OJB 83, Asm 301) purchased in 2013 runs on 05/18/2021 as regional train 2315 down the valley from Les Avants to Montreux and reaches the small Vuarennes stop.

Die BLS Re 465 014 ist am 11.08.2021 mit einem Versuchszug auf der Linie Fischermätteli - Schwarzenburg unterwegs. Dabei wird der neue "Interface"-Wagen Bsi 293 für das Goldenpass-Express Projekt der MOB getestet. Als Brems-/Kuppelwagen dienen je ein SBB EWIV B und ein Dmz von Railadventure.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The BLS Re 465 014 is on the move on August 11, 2021 with a test train on the Fischermätteli - Schwarzenburg line. The new "Interface" car Bsi 293 is being tested for the Goldenpass Express project of the MOB. An SBB EWIV B and a Dmz from Railadventure each serve as brake / coupling wagons.

One of four GDe 4/4 electric locos built for the MOB in 1984, 6004 "Interlaken" is seen at Les Avants on 30 May 1984. It really makes me sad that someone has changed the livery on this line to black and white from blue and cream.

Transfert de la Be 4/4 1002 en queue du train régional 2213 Zweisimmen - Montreux, composé par l'ABDe 8/8 4004 "Fribourg" et une voiture bleue AB, photographiée juste après la gare des Avants.

La Be 4/4 1002 a été décrochée à Chamby et a roulée ensuite toute seule jusqu'à Vevey. Malgré que hier matin son départ à la casse semblait encore inévitable, on peut désormais quand même espérer qu'elle soit conservée. Affaire à suivre...

Photo du transfert de la 1003 l'après-midi sur le réseau du MVR : flic.kr/p/CqzZxW

P.S. : La 1002 est finalement partie à la casse le 30.10.2017, la 1003 un jour plus tard. Dommage pour ces belles automotrices d'origine tessinoise...

Am regnigen 04.06.2017 ist der BCFe 4/4 11 der Museumsbahn Blonay - Chamby unterwegs als Planzug von Blonay nach Chamby.

Der Triebwagen wurde im Jahr 1905 für die MOB gebaut, wurde dort viele Jahre eingesetzt und gelangte im Jahr 2000 schliesslich zur in Chamby ans MOB-Netz anschliessenden ältesten Museumsbahn der Schweiz.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

On rainy 4th of june in 2017, the BCFe 4/4 11 of the Blonay - Chamby Museum Railway is on the way as a scheduled train from Blonay to Chamby.

The railcar was built for the MOB in 1905, was used there for many years and finally came in 2000 to the oldest museum railway in Switzerland, which is connected to the MOB-line in Chamby.

Montreux-Oberland-Bernois (MOB) car Be 4/4 1003 was acquired in 1981 from the Ferrovia Lugano–Ponte Tresa (FLP) in Ticino where it ran as ABe 4/4 5. It was built in 1958 by SWS. It is seen here at Château-d'Œx on 1 September 1985. It was not withdrawn until 2017.

RD224. A dull, grey day at Château-D'Oex in the Swiss Alps. It is on the metre gauge Chemin de fer Montreux–Oberland Bernois (or MOB for short) which runs between Montreux on the shores of Lac Léman (Lake Geneva) and Zweisimmen in the Berner Oberland. The snowplough was certainly being put to good use that day!

Wednesday, 1st March, 2006. Copyright © Ron Fisher.

Der Be 4/4 1003 der MOB konnte am 26.08.2017 anlässlich einer Abschieds-Fotofahrt im Bahnhof Rossinière aufgenommen werden. Dem Triebwagen angehängt wurden die schönen Güterwagen X 65 "AWZ Werbung" und Gk 513 "Fanta".

Der 1958 als ABe 4/4 5 an die Ferrovia Lugano - Ponte Tresa gelieferte Triebwagen wurde 1984 an die MOB verkauft und versah dann jahrelang seinen Dienst als Triebwagen für Regionalzüge und für Rangierarbeiten.

Der Triebwagen wurde trotz diverser Bestrebungen zum weiteren Erhalt am 31.10.2017 abgebrochen.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The Railcar Be 4/4 1003 of the MOB was recorded on August 26, 2017 on the occasion of a farewell photo trip between at the station of Rossinière. The beautiful freight cars X 65 "AWZ Werbung" and Gk 513 "Fanta" were attached to the railcar.

The railcar delivered to Ferrovia Lugano - Ponte Tresa in 1958 as ABe 4/4 5 was sold to MOB in 1984 and then served as a railcar for regional trains and shunting for many years.

It was demolished on October 31, 2017 despite various efforts to maintain it.

The powerful ABDe8/8 coupled pairs are capable of hauling several carriages, even over the MOB's steep gradients. It looks as if four of the MOB's panoramic coaches are coupled in this view. 4001-4004 were built in 1969 by SIG. All are still in MOB stock in 2017.

The latest Golden Pass Line livery was on full diplay on MOB GDe 4/4 6005 'Ville de Bulle' recorded approaching Les Avents with the Regio service R2224, the 12:44 Montreux to Zweisimmen in September 2013.

All images on this site are exclusive property and may not be copied, downloaded, reproduced, transmitted, manipulated or used in any way without expressed written permission of the photographer. All rights reserved – Copyright Don Gatehouse

RD385. The best place from which to enjoy a snowy landscape is from the comfort of a nice warm narrow gauge train. Well, that's my opinion, anyway.

This is a view from a train on the metre gauge Chemin de fer Montreux–Oberland Bernois (or MOB for short) which runs between Montreux on the shores of Lac Léman (Lake Geneva) and Zweisimmen in the Berner Oberland heading back towards Montreux.

Sunday, 5th March, 2006. Copyright © Ron Fisher.

RD354. The best place from which to enjoy a snowy landscape is from the comfort of a nice warm narrow gauge train. Well, that's my opinion, anyway.

This is a view from a train on the metre gauge Chemin de fer Montreux–Oberland Bernois (or MOB for short) which runs between Montreux on the shores of Lac Léman (Lake Geneva) and Zweisimmen in the Berner Oberland and this is a shot from a train as it climbs into the hills above Montreux.

Sunday, 5th March, 2006. Copyright © Ron Fisher.

MOB Class ABDe 8/8 unit 4001 had reach Planchamp on the climb from Montreux with the 16:44 Regio service R 2232 to Zweisimmen.

All images on this site are exclusive property and may not be copied, downloaded, reproduced, transmitted, manipulated or used in any way without expressed written permission of the photographer. All rights reserved – Copyright Don Gatehouse
